ComicInfo.Summary:
Chia Bieber Pet: Parody of Chia Pets.
How Barack Obama Stacks Up Against The Other 42 U.S. Presidents: Similarities and differences between President Obama and each of his predecessors.
7 Periods Closer To Death: A teen humiliates his guidance counselor with information from the guy's Facebook page.
Undercover Boob: Parody of the TV show "Undercover Boss."
The Strip Club: A collection of comic strips.
Wild, Unfounded Rumors Surrounding The Xbox Kinect: Things that might be included in the new Xbox game system...but aren't.
It's A Recession...It's A Depression...: How to tell the difference between an economic recession and a depression.
Justin Bieber First Step 2 Obscurity: My Story: Parody of Justin Bieber's book "Justin Bieber First Step 2 Forever: My Story", presented as fake excerpts from the book.
Spy vs. Spy: In the first story, the White Spy traps the Black Spy in a giant microwave disguised as an office. In the second story, the Black Spy blows up the White Spy with a brief case bomb.
A MAD Look At Murder: A look at all a variety of things that could go wrong in attempted murders.
MAD's Moronic Outakes From Sarah Palin's Alaska: Stills from the TV show "Sarah Palin's Alaska" with fake dialog.
What We Really Learned From WikiLeaks: Unlikey things that WikiLeaks revelations may have taught us.
Sadmen: Parody of TV show "Madmen", where we see all the problems of the characters and the ad agency picks up accounts of several big businesses of the early 1960s that later went bankrupt.
The Fundalini Pages: Various short satires of pop culture.
